basic.name: Healing Potion (Q)
basic.description: Throw a Healing Potion on the ground that heals the first allied Hero that comes in contact with it for 285. Limit 5 active Potions.

basic.name: Horadric Cube (W)
basic.description: Release the Horadric Cube. After 0.5 seconds it explodes, dealing 80 damage to all enemies in the area and Slowing them by 35% for 2 seconds.
passives: {highlight}Horadric cube will now roulette between 7 gems sequentially each time it's cast, each gem will have a different effect.{/highlight}

basic.name: Scroll Of Sealing (E)
basic.description: Unfurl an enchanted scroll over 2.25 seconds, forming a triangle that deals 150 damage to enemies inside and Roots them for 1.5 seconds.

heroic.name: Stay Awhile and Listen (R)
heroic.description: After 1 second, Channel for 3 seconds, putting enemy Heroes in front of Deckard to Sleep while Channeling, and for 2 seconds after. Enemies can only be put to Sleep once per cast, and Sleep's effects end instantly if they take damage.

heroic.name: Lorenado (R)
heroic.description: Vector Targeting. After 1 second, create a twirling tome tornado that travels towards the targeted direction, continually knocking away enemies that come into contact with it. Deals 20 damage to Heroes hit.
passives: {highlight}Will also apply the gem effect from the roulette.{/highlight}

trait.name: Fortitude of the Faithful (T)
trait.description: When at least 1 other allied Hero is nearby, Deckard gains 10 Armor and his Basic Abilities recharge 50% faster.

1.name: Scroll of Identify
1.quest: {highlight}Quest: Hitting an enemy Hero with Scroll of Sealing permanently increases its damage by 2.{/highlight}
rewards: {highlight} 15 hits Scroll of sealing will also apply gems from the roulette and reveal hit heroes by 6 seconds.{/highlight}
{highlight} 30 hits Scroll of sealing now deal 500% extra damage to summons.{/highlight}

1.name: Scroll of town portal
1.description: {highlight}Deckard Cain creates a portal at both the Halls of the Storm and his original Hearthstone location. Allied heroes can teleport between these positions. The portal lasts for 6 seconds and vanishes if Deckard Cain uses it.{/highlight}

1.name: Polished Sapphire
1.description: {highlight}Activate to lock Sapphire on the roulette and increase the damage of the next Horadric Cube by 100% and its slow from by 30%.{/highlight}

4.name: Potion of Shielding
4.description: Whenever an ally is healed by a Healing Potion, they gain a 140 Shield for 6 seconds.

4.name: Mana potion
4.description: {highlight}Whenever an ally is healed by a healing potion, they restore 35 mana under 3 seconds and gain 10% spell power on that duration.{/highlight}

4.name: Polished Ruby
4.description: {highlight}Activate to lock Ruby on the roulette and increase the damage of the next Horadric Cube by 100% and it spawns 3 Lesser Healing Potions from each enemy Hero hit, healing allied Heroes for 250 when picked up. Lesser Healing Potions last for 10 seconds.{/highlight}

7.name: Cube Mastery
7.description: Reduce the Mana cost of Scroll of Sealing from 40 to 25. Each enemy Hero hit by Horadric Cube reduces the cooldown of Scroll of Sealing by 4 seconds.

7.name: Kanai's Cube
7.description: Horadric Cube reduces Hero damage dealt by 30% for 4 seconds.

7.name: Polished Emerald
7.description: {highlight}Activate to lock Emerald on the roulette and make the next Horadric Cube reduce healing received by 75% for 4 seconds.{/highlight}

10.name: Stay Awhile and Listen
10.description: After 1 second, Channel for 3 seconds, putting enemy Heroes in front of Deckard to Sleep while Channeling, and for 2 seconds after. Enemies can only be put to Sleep once per cast, and Sleep's effects end instantly if they take damage.

10.name: Lorenado
10.description: Vector Targeting. After 1 second, create a twirling tome tornado that travels towards the targeted direction, continually knocking away enemies that come into contact with it. Deals 20 damage to Heroes hit.
passives: {highlight}Will also apply the gem effect from the roulette.{/highlight}

13.name: Super Healing Potion
13.description: If a Healing Potion isn't picked up for at least 2 seconds, it heals for 100% more.
passives: Healing Potion heals for 25% more when the target is under 50% health.

13.name: Hotbar
13.description: {highlight}Whenever an ally is healed by a healing potion 0.5 seconds after it's cast grants 15 armor and 15% movement speed for 2 seconds.{/highlight}

13.name: Ancient Blessings
13.description: Cooldown: 45s. Activate Fortitude of the Faithful to empower nearby allied Hero Basic Attacks for 8 seconds, causing them to deal an additional 62 damage in an area and heal for 90 for each Hero hit. This effect can only occur once per second.

16.name: Scroll of Stone Curse
16.description: Scroll of Sealing deals 200% more damage when hitting at least 2 Heroes.

16.name: Safety in Numbers
16.description: If at least 2 allied Heroes are nearby, Fortitude of the Faithful grants an additional 10 Armor, 50% Mana Regeneration per second, and causes Deckard's Basic Abilities to recharge an additional 50% faster.

16.name: Horadric Staff
16.description: Every 5 seconds, Deckard's next Basic Attack Stuns Heroes for 0.75 seconds.

20.name: Respect the Elderly
20.description: Stay Awhile and Listen Silences and Blinds enemies for 3 seconds upon waking up from Sleep.

20.name: Morenados!
20.description: Lorenado gains an additional charge and its cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds every time an enemy Hero is knocked back. This effect can only occur once per 0.5 seconds.

20.name: Bottomless Flask
20.description: After use, Healing Potions recharge after 8 seconds.
passives: {highlight}Hitting enemy heros with Scroll of Sealing and horadric cube recharges the potions 0.75 second faster.{/highlight}

20.name: Perfect Gems
20.description: {highlight}Horadric cube will now cast 3 times at the target position with 0.5 delay between casts, each time applying the following gem on the roulette.{/highlight}.
